Cốc Cốc: Project Manager

12 May 2012

Job description</strong>

The candidate would be responsible for managing high-load projects in our rapidly growing company. He/she will be in charge of setting up and tracing the work-flow, handling the communication among teammates, and making analysis for improving the search quality of the system.

Responsibilities:</strong>

  • Lead the ideation, technical development, and launch of innovative products;</li>
  • Set up the communication environment in an international team;</li>
  • Organize product development with a team of world-class developers;</li>
  • Analyze the current trends in the market to improve the product's quality.</li>
    </ul>
    Requirements:</strong>

    • Degree in Computer Science or a related technical field;</li>
    • Product management experience;</li>
    • At least 5 years experience in IT field;</li>
    • Exceptional communication and presentation skills;</li>
    • Exceptional organizational and analytical skills;</li>
    • Excellent English skills;</li>
    • Excellent Algorithm skills;</li>
    • Understanding of the technical architecture of complex and highly scalable projects;</li>
    • Experience in developing big & complex products, technologies and platforms is a strong advantage.</li>
      </ul>
      Benefits:</strong>

      • Competitive salary;</li>
      • Free lunch;</li>
      • Health support;</li>
      • Company assistance for internet and cell phone;</li>
      • Regular team building activities;</li>
      • Young and dynamic international working environment.</li>
      • Free accommodation with maid/house keeper;</li>
      • Transportation support;</li>
      • School fee for children;</li>
        </ul>

        Location:</strong> Hanoi, Vietnam</div>
        About us</strong>

        We are a young, rapidly-growing IT company with the aim of building a Vietnamese web search engine with modern processing technology of Vietnamese language and ability to provide results based on users’ regions. Our team accumulates specialists from all over the world, combining the strength of Russian IT-gurus and talented Vietnamese. We are always glad to see new members in our company, and we enjoy overcoming new challenges together.


        </strong>
